#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std ;
#define ll long long int
int dp[2001][2001] ;
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,n,m,p,t ;
    cin >> t ;
    char a[100001] ;
    char b[100001] ;

    while(t--) {
        cin >> a ;
        cin >> b ;
        int k1,k2,k3,k4 ;
        int l1 = strlen(a) ;
        int l2 = strlen(b) ;
        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp)) ;
        for(i=0;i<=l2;i++) dp[i][0] = i ;
        for(i=0;i<=l1;i++) dp[0][i] = i ;
        for(i=1;i<=l2;i++) {
            for(j=1;j<=l1;j++) {
                if(b[i-1] == a[j-1]) {
                    k1 = dp[i-1][j-1]  ;
                }
                else k1 = dp[i-1][j-1] + 1 ;
                k2 = dp[i-1][j] + 1 ;
                k3 = dp[i][j-1] + 1 ;
                dp[i][j] = k1<k2?(k1<k3?k1:k3):(k2<k3?k2:k3) ;
            }
        }
        cout << dp[l2][l1] << endl ;
    }

    return 0 ;
}
